item.title: Git/posh-git commands
item.description: After frustration with GitHub for Windows, thanks to Google+ I've completely switched to posh-git. Here are the commands I end up using.

item.title: Unofficial Xbox Live API wrappers
item.description: This morning I created two API wrappers for the Mashape implementations of XboxApi.com and XboxLeaders.com.

item.title: Brief thoughts after 1 month of GitHub
item.description: Very brief thoughts after about a month of GitHub.

item.title: My Video Game Tracker (for Windows Phone 7) on GitHub
item.description: Yesterday morning I committed version 1.2 of My Video Game Tracker to a public repository on GitHub.
